abstract.description: This code is a CMSSW module producing flat tuples from 2011A Jet data, set up at Research level, i.e. it requires university-student-level programming experience. Minimal acquaintance with Linux and the ROOT analysis package (https://root.cern.ch/) as well as a basic text editor is needed.

note.description: The content of the resulting root file is described in readme

system_details.description: Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment

title: Example code for production of flat jet tuple using 2011 data

usage.description:
If you do not have the CERN Virtual Machine for 2011 CMS data installed, follow the instructions in step 1 at How to install a CERN Virtual Machine.

To run the analysis, follow the instructions in https://github.com/cms-opendata-validation/2011-jet-inclusivecrosssection-ntupleproduction-optimized.

use_with.description: Use this with 2011 Jets primary dataset and QCD MC dataset (see detailed instructions in the readme file and code).
